Current CEO Eric Schmidt will become "executive chairman," Google said. Eric Schmidt has put his foot in his mouth so far on key issues like privacy that he's kicked himself out of the CEO's office, said John M. Simpson , director of Consumer Watchdog's Inside Google Project. Consumer Watchdog looks forward to engaging with Page as he assumes his new role and discussing consumer issues like protecting consumers' online privacy.
